A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many plot holes\, lack of a cohesive story between episode 7 and 8\, quite a bit of filler scenes that did nothing to progress the story\, and a cast of characters that have been interesting at times but underdeveloped overall.  What somewhat saves the movie\, are the spectacular visuals and great space battles.  While it is enjoyable\, I think a mess has been created for JJ Abrams to conclude the trilogy in a way that is meaningful and interesting.
